title: Handle a Customer Bankruptcy Filing
description: A customer files for bankruptcy. The finance department must file a claim for any outstanding debt.

tasks.description: Receive notification of the customer's bankruptcy filing.
Compile a list of all outstanding invoices for the customer.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates a report of all money owed.

tasks.description: File a proof of claim with the bankruptcy court for the outstanding amount.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully files the legal claim.
